definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
motion of no confidence (against the government, in parliamentary debates)

sentences.english: He distrusted doctors, and often had Don check his blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他不信任医生，常叫唐帮他量血压。

sentences.english: How can I rebuild my trust in him?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才能重新建立起我对他的信任？

sentences.english: He always cheats others, thus none of us trust him.
sentences.chinese: 他经常唬人，因此大家都不信任他。

sentences.english: I want to keep that trust.
He likes cheating people so we usually don't quite trust him.
sentences.chinese: 哄人，所以大家一般不太信任他。

sentences.english: Dr. Webb says people did not trust the clinic at first.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯医生说，最开始人们不信任这家诊所。

sentences.english: Speak, write, pray, and love the children entrusted to me.
sentences.chinese: 讲说，写信，祈祷，爱所有信任我的孩子。

sentences.english: The social worker had to deal with the poor family's mistrust of strangers.
sentences.chinese: 该社工人员必须应付这户穷苦人家对陌生人的不信任。

sentences.english: But in our experience, too many managers err on the side of mistrust.
sentences.chinese: 但在我们的经验中，有太多的管理员在不信任上犯错。

sentences.english: This introduces the idea of a trusted connection.
sentences.chinese: 这就引出了受信任连接的思想。

sentences.english: I should never have trusted him.
sentences.chinese: 我原先就不应该那么信任他。

sentences.english: I think it"s hard to believe."
The second function is to support brokering trust relationships.
sentences.chinese: 第二个函数是为了支持中介信任关系。

sentences.english: What's more, it's often the most trusted workers who are committing the thefts.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，干偷窃行为的人通常是最受信任的工人。

sentences.english: Customers trust and support the development of power Surpass clothing.
sentences.chinese: 客户的信任和支持是斯伯士服饰发展的动力。

sentences.english: Trust is the mother of deciet.

definition: to trust/to have confidence in/to have faith in/to rely on
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to have faith in/to believe in/to have confidence in/to respect
to appreciate/to recognize the worth of sth/appreciation
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
